Lord Privy Sealsecretary, TreasuryThe Rt H _ The Rt Hon Norman Tebbit MPSecretar ^g l LaWS n MP Secretary of State for Employmentietary of State for Energy becreuaryThe Rt- u " Thp Rt Hon Tom King MPWen0" Vinson MP Secretary of State for the EnvironmentPa* lor of the Duchy of Lancaster and becretaryayTn^ter GeneralitCONFIDENTIAL g^j H CONFIDENTIALALSO PRESENTThe Rt Hon Michael Jopling MPParliamentary Secretary, TreasurySECRETARYSir Robert ArmstrongSUBJECTTHE BUDGETtii^ CONFIDENTIAL CONFIDENTIALIBUDGET THE CHANCELLOR OF THE EXCHEQUER informed the Cabinet of theproposals in his forthcoming Budget.In accordance with precedent, details are not recorded in theCabinet conclusions.The Cabinet -Took note, with approval, of the Chancellor ofthe Exchequer's Budget proposals.?Cabinet Office15 March 1983i^ CONFIDENTIALA ?mm ~7 'lm
